doc:
Christopher George https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_George 0 Christopher John George (February 25, 1931 – November 28, 1983) was an American television and film actor, best known for his starring role on the 1960s television series The Rat Patrol. He was nominated for a Golden Globe Award in 1967 as Best TV Star for his performance in the series. He was also the recipient of a New York Film Festival award as the Best Actor in a Television Commercial. George was married to actress Lynda Day George. Christopher_John_George ( February_25_,_1931 – November_28_,_1983 ) was an_American_television_and_film_actor , best_known for his_starring_role on the_1960s_television_series The_Rat_Patrol . He was_nominated for a_Golden_Globe_Award in 1967_as_Best_TV_Star for his_performance in the_series . He was also the_recipient of a_New_York_Film_Festival_award as the_Best_Actor in a_Television_Commercial . George was_married to actress_Lynda_Day_George .
